General.Name: Seoul City Gas
General.Description: Seoul City Gas Co., Ltd. supplies natural gas to residential, commercial, and industrial customers in South Korea. The company operates 4,441 kilometers of distribution pipelines covering a total distribution area of 1,249 square kilometers. It serves approximately 2.47 million families in the 11 areas of North Western Seoul, as well as the cities of Gyunggi-do. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
